Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
pyXLWriter is a Python library for generating Excel compatible spreadsheets.
It's a port of John McNamara's Perl Spreadsheet::WriteExcel module
version 1.01 to Python. It allows writing of Excel spreadsheets
without the need for COM objects.
info.keywords: xls excel spreadsheet workbook database table
info.name: pyXLWriter
info.summary: A library for generating Excel Spreadsheets
info.html_description: pyXLWriter is a Python library for generating Excel compatible spreadsheets. It’s a port of John McNamara’s Perl Spreadsheet::WriteExcel module version 1.01 to Python. It allows writing of Excel spreadsheets without the need for COM objects.
